OWNER

  • The property must be owner-occupied.
  • The property must be a manufactured home on a permanent foundation.
  • The minimum loan amount for eligible Borrowers is $XXX; the maximum is $XXX.
  • Applicant household income cannot exceed 80% of Los Angeles County Area Median Income (AMI).

PROPERTIES GUIDELINES

  • The property must be within the City of La Puente’s limits/boundaries.
  • Occupancy Ratio: No more than 1.5 people per living space (including bedrooms, living room, family room, den/study).
  • CalHome program funds in support of an Owner-Occupied Rehabilitation program shall be used only for the following costs:
  • (a) Cost of Rehabilitation of the property.
  • (b) Cost of building permits and other related government fees.
  • (c) Cost of an appraisal, architectural, engineering, and other consultant services that are directly related to the Rehabilitation of the property.
  • (d) Non-recurring Loan closing costs.
  • (e) Replacement cost of a manufactured home not on a permanent foundation, where it has been determined by the Recipient that it is infeasible to rehabilitate the home.

LOAN TERMS

  • Principal and interest payments shall be deferred for the term of the CalHome Loan.
  • The full loan amount becomes due and payable in the following circumstances:
  • (a) Sale or transfer of the property, excluding permitted transfers
  • (b) The owner no longer occupies the property as their primary residence

PAYMENT BREAKDOWN

The Loan shall be due and payable in 20 years, with 10 percent of the original principal to be forgiven annually for each additional year beyond the 10th year that the Borrower owns and continuously occupies the home. Example: The original loan amount is $XXX with a 3% simple interest added, totaling $XX.
1st -10th Year: Full amount due, no deductions.
11th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
12th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
13th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
14th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
15th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
16th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
17th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
18th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
19th Year: 10% reduction from principal amount, lowering amount to $XXX.
20th Year: Final 10% reduction, with a remaining balance of $XXX—only being the 3% simple interest for repayment
Simple Interest Repayment: The accrued simple interest cannot be waived. A monthly repayment of $XXX will be required over the span of one year to settle the remaining balance.

HOW TO APPLY!

The City of La Puente has been awarded the CalHome Grant to assist individual first-time homebuyers through deferred-payment loans for down payment assistance and home rehabilitation. Please complete the form, and we will contact you as soon as possible.

CONTACT US!
